messages.ComponentSelectorAdditions.CurrentPathIn: Adds an indicator for the current category (and generic Type) path to omponent selectors.
messages.ComponentSelectorAdditions.DefaultHandle: Handles the default behavior for the events of the Injector at normal priority.
messages.ComponentSelectorAdditions.FavoritesCate: Adds 'Favorites' categories to Component selectors and ProtoFlux Node browser roots and makes categories and components / nodes favoritable.
messages.ComponentSelectorAdditions.FixedBackButt: Places the 'Back' button on Component selectors outside of the scrollable area.
messages.ComponentSelectorAdditions.FixedCancelBu: Places the 'Cancel' button on Component selectors outside of the scrollable area.
messages.ComponentSelectorAdditions.GenericPreset: Allows saving custom generic Type arguments as presets, which will be added to the list of Common Generic Types on any valid Component / Node.
messages.ComponentSelectorAdditions.Injector.Desc: Makes the Component selector generation and listing modular by handling it through events.
messages.ComponentSelectorAdditions.RecentsCatego: Adds 'Recents' categories to the Component selector and ProtoFlux Node browser roots which display the latest used ones.
messages.ComponentSelectorAdditions.SearchBar.Des: Adds a searchbar to Component selectors which allows searching components or ProtoFlux nodes.
